name: Que Sera Sera Demo
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------

In the demo there are three routes and endings.

You can use a keyboard or a remote control.
To restart the game incase of a bug you should press "R" or "Start" a the remote control.
The bugs are normal thing here.
This is just a demo all the content maybe will be chaged in the future.
Enjoy the game!

---------------------------------------------------------------
